price: Mu by’ukuri muri ibyo harimo ikimenyetso (kigaragaza ubushobozi bwa Allah), nyamara abenshi muri bo ntibemera.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
